name: librnr
body:
[![Build Status](http://colorado.roadnarrows.com:40105/buildStatus/icon?job=librnr)](http://colorado.roadnarrows.com:40105/job/librnr/)

***

***librnr*** provides an extensive set of utilities and features (e.g. logging, options parsing, hashing, etc) that are used to unify and simplify all RoadNarrows software packages.

## Installation:
### Via apt-get (currently available for Ubuntu 12.04 64-bit)
``` bash
    wget -O - http://roadnarrows.com/packages.roadnarrows.key | sudo apt-key add -
    sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install rnr-librnr-dev
```

### From source (using CMake)
``` bash
    git clone http://github.com/roadnarrows-robotics/librnr
    cd librnr
    mkdir build
    cd build
    cmake ..
    make && make install
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
